title: Google DAI
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user is watching MLB.TV
custom_steps: WHEN the user hits an ad break
custom_expected: THEN ads should play from Google DAI

title: Google DAI- Amazon parameters
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user who is entitled to watch archived and live games on Amazon TV
custom_steps: WHEN the video feed of a game loads
custom_expected:
THEN extra custom ad server targeting parameters are retrieved from APS
AND passed to the Google DAI session

title: Google DAI- parameters AndroidTV
custom_preconds: GIVEN a user who is entitled to watch archived and lives games on Google TV
custom_steps: WHEN the video feed of a game loads
custom_expected: THEN no extra custom ad server targeting parameters are passed to the Google DAI session

title: Google DAI- Media Playback Verification
custom_steps: WHEN  pod metadata is received from Google
custom_expected:
THEN verify the media id
AND overlay the successful/failed response
AND display the event that occurred
